info.name: Login tests
info.description:
A collection of tests for the GAD application from jaktestowac.pl. Contains REST API tests developed by the KawQA team.  
GAD documentation available at:  
[https://github.com/jaktestowac/gad-gui-api-demo](https://github.com/jaktestowac/gad-gui-api-demo)
